quizzes.question: What is the difference between include and require?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]include vs require[/h1]

The [b]require[/b] statement is identical to include, the exception being that, upon failure, it produces a fatal error. 
When a file is included using the [b]include[/b] statement, but PHP is unable to find it, the script continues to execute.
In the case of [b]require[/b], the script will cease execution and produce an error.
[note]Use [b]require[/b] when the file is required for the application to run.
Use [b]include[/b] when the file is not required. The application should continue, even when the file is not found.[/note]
